Name: Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, MA, USA
Desc: Neoclassical & modern wings house a vast collection from ancient Egyptian to contemporary American.

Name: Museum of Science, Boston, MA, USA
Address: 1 Museum Of Science Driveway, Boston, MA 02114, USA
Desc: Museum of Science is located in Boston at 1 Science Park, opposite of North Point Park. It has over 700 exhibits and is very popular among children and youth. The museum offers tours, courses, numerous special education programs, education support and numerous activities for schools and universities. The museum is also a member of the Association of Zoos and Aquariums, with over 100 rescued animals including some unique and rare species.

Name: Boston Children's Museum
Desc: Fun, hands-on educational exhibits aimed at kids 11 & under, plus a play space for toddlers.

Name: John F. Kennedy Presidential Library and Museum
Desc: President Kennedy exhibits, videos & research collections in a striking I.M. Pei-designed building.

Name: Museum of Ice Cream, New York, NY, USA
Address: 5th Ave & 103rd St, New York, NY 10029, USA
Desc: Museum of Ice Cream located at 100 Gansevoort St in New York is a dream destination for children. A real-life fairy tale includes a pool of sprinkles, a chocolate ice-cream room and other things young children can only dread about. And certainly everyone is treated with ice-cream of own choice))
